name: udacity-fsjd
description: This is a monorepo for my projects created as part of the Full Stack JavaScript Developer curriculum put on by Udacity for the Nanodegree of the same name.

scripts.frontend:deploy: cd angular-storefront && aws s3 cp ./dist/angular-storefront s3://fsjdbucket --recursive
scripts.backend:build: cd storefront-api && npm createkeys && npm run build
